name: gitProxy
description: A build task to set git config for proxy. This runs before Get Sources task.
author: H. Kikuchi

inputs.name: ProxyConfig
inputs.label: proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Syntax is `protocol://user:password@proxyhost:port`. If the credential is not needed, `protocol://proxyhost:port`. See [git docs](https://git-scm.com/docs/git-config#git-config-httpproxy)
